text: The Canon lourd de 8 Gribeauval (Gribeauval heavy 8-pounder cannon) was a French canon and part of the Gribeauval system developed by Jean Baptiste Vaquette de Gribeauval. It was part of the siege artillery.Napoleon's Guns, 1792-1815 by Rene Chartrand, Ray Hutchins p.6-7 Breech of Le Rigide. The canon lourd de 8 Gribeauval was used extensively during the wars following the French Revolution, as well as the Napoleonic wars. Some of the earlier Gribeauval siege guns kept the baroque "dolphin" design for the handles. ==Notes== Category:Artillery of France
title: Canon lourd de 8 Gribeauval
